attributes.additional_details: This is the only safe form of communication between families and friends whilst our troops are serving abroad. It is paramount that the moral of our troop is kept up whilst they are protecting us and if that means we spend £1million a year on them being able to hear from their loved ones and are able to tell their partners, parents, friends and children that they are safe then the Bluey cannot be lost.
attributes.background: As you may have read in the press the MOD is once again making cuts. It has been decided that blueys will be stopped to save £1million a year however they're not thinking about the moral of our troops fighting on the front line. They need the communication of loved ones! We must save the bluey!
